snippet.title: PlayStation Experience 2015: Dead Star - Capital Ship Escape Run | PS4
snippet.description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/dead-star-ps4/

First look at Dead Star's Capital Ship Escape Run game mode.
Pre-order now at www.deadstargame.com to gain access to the Multiplayer Beta.

Dead Star is a team-based multiplayer arcade-shooter/strategy hybrid. As a pilot banished to the far reaches of known space, you'll fly a variety of starships through procedurally generated regions of space as you battle against your fellow criminals.

In Dead Star's Escape Run mode, you and your crew discover a powerful warship lost in the ruins of an ancient battlefield. You'll escort the warship as it warps into a series of live player matches, each more hazardous than the last. If you can survive the journey, you may just escape the Dead Star once and for all! 

http://www.deadstargame.com
